newsitem.title: UK: BOE names interim UK interim monetary committee.
newsitem.headline: BOE names interim UK interim monetary committee.

text.p: The Bank of England on Friday listed the names of the members of the interim Monetary Policy Committee which will be deciding the level of UK interest rates until the final nine-member panel has been appointed.
Executive directors Mervyn King and Ian Plenderleith will join Bank of England Governor Eddie George and his deputy Howard Davies on the committee.
